channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 在前共和党全国委员会主席罗娜-麦克丹尼尔（Ronna McDaniel）的聘用引发了主播和评论员的现场反弹之后，NBC 新闻的高级管理人员正在讨论她作为 NBC 新闻特约撰稿人的未来。
item.description:
Senior NBC News executives are discussing the future of former Republican National Committee Chairwoman Ronna McDaniel as an NBC News contributor after her hiring sparked on-air backlash from anchors and commentators https://t.co/LlGTJCiOaI https://t.co/LlGTJCiOaI

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥在被一艘大型集装箱船撞击后坍塌到帕塔普斯科河中
item.description:
Baltimore’s Francis Scott Key Bridge collapsed into the Patapsco River after being struck by a large containership https://t.co/0xNDx1NKxF pic.twitter.com/vdAvJyzmnE

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 检察官将撤销对得克萨斯州总检察长肯-帕克斯顿（Ken Paxton）的重罪指控，作为交换条件，帕克斯顿将赔偿指控他的人并参加法律教育课程
item.description:
Prosecutors will drop felony charges against Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton, in exchange for Paxton giving restitution to his accusers and attending legal education classes https://t.co/qaq7NeQgHJ https://t.co/qaq7NeQgHJ

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
item.description:
Robert F. Kennedy Jr. has picked Nicole Shanahan, a California-based attorney who was previously married to Google co-founder Sergey Brin, as his running mate for his long shot presidential bid https://t.co/hfWegXhLhR https://t.co/hfWegXhLhR

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体公司股价在上市首日大涨 40%，使这位总统候选人的身家大增。问题是，他多久才能动用他在 Truth Social 大约 55 亿美元的股份？
item.description:
Shares of Donald Trump’s social-media company surged 40% on their first day of trading, boosting the presidential candidate’s fortune.

The question is, how soon can he tap his roughly $5.5 billion stake in Truth Social? https://t.co/aXX4ka9gNA https://t.co/aXX4ka9gNA

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 突发事件一艘大型集装箱船撞上巴尔的摩一座大桥，六人失踪，两人已被找到
item.description:

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 威士卡、万事达卡和美国最大的信用卡发卡银行同意与因信用卡刷卡手续费而起诉它们的商家达成和解协议
item.description:
Visa, Mastercard and the largest U.S. credit-card issuing banks agree to a settlement with merchants that have been suing them over the fees they charge for swiping credit cards https://t.co/VgD9SOqzHi https://t.co/VgD9SOqzHi

item.title: 购房者发现，阿拉巴马州这个鲜为人知的郡不仅比佛罗里达州的热门养老胜地更经济实惠，而且拥有同样的天气和海滩。
item.description:
Homebuyers are finding that this little-known Alabama county is not only more affordable than popular retirement destinations in Florida, but has the same weather and same beaches. https://t.co/9fpLBoeH3r https://t.co/9fpLBoeH3r

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 全世界的女性都报告说，她们比男性更苦恼也更满意自己的生活。@EmilyBobrow 问，这是怎么回事？
item.description:
Women around the world report being both more distressed and more satisfied with their lives than men. @EmilyBobrow asks, what’s going on? https://t.co/Phf4bQcoXT https://t.co/Phf4bQcoXT

item.title: 当一位亿万富翁开始在明尼苏达州德卢斯市（Duluth）的一个小岛上购买并推倒房屋时，人们不禁要问，到底发生了什么？

item.title: 在甜甜圈制造商 Krispy Kreme 表示已达成在全美麦当劳餐厅销售其甜甜圈的协议后，该公司股价大涨。

item.title: 特朗普在 Truth Social 董事会的盟友将决定他何时可以出售股票。如果他们允许，他可以套现数亿美元的股票

item.title: 观看：当局称，巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥坍塌，导致车辆和人员落水。警方称，此案被视为大规模伤亡事件。
item.description:
Watch: Baltimore’s Francis Scott Key bridge collapsed, sending vehicles and people into the water, authorities said. Police said the case was being treated as a mass casualty incident. https://t.co/ZUUz4SAHv0 https://t.co/ZUUz4SAHv0

item.title: 夫妻疗法有了新的变体。这种疗法被称为 "高效疗法"，在尝试过这种疗法的人中迅速赢得拥趸。
item.description:
Couples therapy has a new variant. Called “high-impact therapy,” it is rapidly gaining fans among those who’ve tried it. https://t.co/9xJojNLQgg https://t.co/9xJojNLQgg

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 他曾是一名律师，生活在美国梦中。后来，精神疾病让他的聪明才智与自己背道而驰。"他的姐姐说："我们以为他会得到他需要的帮助。相反，他失去了一切。
item.description:
He was a lawyer living the American dream. Then mental illness turned his brilliant mind against him. “We thought he was going to get the help he needed,” his sister said. Instead, he lost it all. https://t.co/EKMfVKC9bA https://t.co/EKMfVKC9bA

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 超级通勤者需要大量的金钱、里程数和耐力。以下是《华尔街日报》的一位记者如何从俄亥俄州的家中前往纽约工作。
item.description:
Being a supercommuter takes a lot of money, miles and stamina. Here's how a WSJ reporter has been traveling to work in New York City from his home in Ohio. https://t.co/qzuXO3z7Sy https://t.co/qzuXO3z7Sy

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 反垄断机构称，克罗格公司计划收购阿尔伯森公司，这将使争夺美国人食品杂费的传统超市数量减少
item.description:
Antitrust authorities say Kroger’s planned Albertsons takeover will leave fewer traditional supermarkets to compete for Americans’ grocery dollars https://t.co/FZnnVpI6Zn https://t.co/FZnnVpI6Zn

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 英国法官裁定朱利安-阿桑奇（Julian Assange）不能立即被引渡到美国接受间谍指控，这为数月的进一步法律纠纷开辟了道路
item.description:
British judges ruled that Julian Assange can’t immediately be extradited to the U.S. to face spying charges, opening the way for months of further legal wrangling https://t.co/fc9bH86ZYW https://t.co/fc9bH86ZYW

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 街谈巷议：关注人工智能热潮的投资者正在转向市场中一个不太可能的角落--拥有发电厂的公司。涨势是否合理？
item.description:

item.title: 多米尼加共和国正在修建隔离墙，以阻止海地人进入，因为混乱正在席卷这个邻国。这是该国数百年来激烈分裂的最新阶段。
item.description:
The Dominican Republic is building a wall to keep out Haitians, as chaos engulfs the neighboring country. It’s the latest phase in centuries of bitter division there. https://t.co/VNWlcS1jcJ https://t.co/VNWlcS1jcJ

item.title: 大谷翔平说他从未在体育上赌博。@JasonGay 写道，他没有回答媒体的问题，但仍有很多疑问。
item.description:
Shohei Ohtani said he has never gambled on sports. He took no questions from the media, but plenty of questions remain, writes @JasonGay. https://t.co/dvlfwy3qLC https://t.co/dvlfwy3qLC

item.title: 中国对这个曾经充满活力的城市的控制日益加强，香港社会的任何角落都无法幸免。"当潜规则、不成文的规定越来越多时，人们感到迷茫，只能眼睁睁地看着，默默地接受"。
item.description:
No corner of Hong Kong’s society has been left untouched by China’s tightening grip on the once-vibrant city. “When there are more and more unspoken, unwritten rules, people feel lost and can only watch and silently accept.” https://t.co/XdrShX7PAw https://t.co/XdrShX7PAw

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 贝莱德首席执行官在年度信函中表示，人口老龄化正在给退休安全网带来压力，随着医学突破延长人们的寿命，这一问题将进一步恶化
item.description:
BlackRock’s chief executive says in annual letter that an aging population is stressing retirement safety nets, an issue that is set to worsen as medical breakthroughs extend people’s lives https://t.co/0mz7ZEe1vE https://t.co/0mz7ZEe1vE

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 艾琳-霍利（Erin Hawley）是在最高法院为反对堕胎药案辩护的律师，同时也是华盛顿一对年轻权贵夫妇中较为低调的另一半。
item.description:
Erin Hawley is the lawyer arguing the case against the abortion pill at the Supreme Court, as well as the lower-profile half of a young Washington power couple https://t.co/6Ix7VFRyFu https://t.co/6Ix7VFRyFu

item.title: 由于阿拉伯国家未能填补美国留下的资金缺口，联合国巴勒斯坦难民事务机构 Unwra 的未来岌岌可危。
item.description:
The future of Unwra, the U.N. agency for Palestinian refugees, is in the air as Arab countries fail to fill the funding gap left by the U.S. https://t.co/Hdh9sFo5FY https://t.co/Hdh9sFo5FY

item.title: 俄罗斯法院将埃文-格什科维奇（Evan Gershkovich）的拘留期延长了三个月，这距离《华尔街日报》记者因被指控从事间谍活动而被拘留已将近一年。
item.description:
A Russian court extended the detention of Evan Gershkovich by three months, almost a year since The Wall Street Journal reporter was detained there on an allegation of espionage https://t.co/WJSmHLU9mf https://t.co/WJSmHLU9mf

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 在推翻 "罗伊诉韦德 "案两年后，最高法院将审理一起案件，该案可能会限制美国最常用的终止意外怀孕的方法
item.description:
Two years after overturning Roe v. Wade, the Supreme Court will hear a case that could restrict the nation’s most common method to end unwanted pregnancies https://t.co/8TMFwCju7M https://t.co/8TMFwCju7M
